title: ESTD Ethnic Group Cultural School
description: This is only one insititution in Bandarban area and one of the best cultural school for the ethnic group people all over the world. More than 500 people work here for improving our school facilitics. Moreover more than 1000 student already tranined from this school.

name: Bir Bahadur U Shey Shing Mp
title: Chairman of EGC-School
description: Bir Bahadur U Shay Shing MP take step to established this institution in 2015 and he is the chairman of this institution. He thought that ethnic people are not so enrich in different sector and he trying to improve their knowledge in this institution

name: Ukhengching Marma
title: Principle of EGC-School
description: Ukhengching is the principle of this institution and he thought that the ethnic group cultural school will improve ethnic peoples knowledge and one day they will contribute for our nation
